topics.body:
While we're on the topic of 4chan

While /co/ generally likes Tokusatsu, There are people there who think that they're just Poor man's versions of American superheroes.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d5609c6368723a9f7b0000#post_53d5609c6368723a9f7b0000
Goddamn do I want to punch something now.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d560eb6368723834690000#post_53d560eb6368723834690000
Seriously? Hasn't Tokusatsu been around for forty plus years or so now? I mean even if they started out as the poor man's version of american super heros they've pretty much become 100% their own thing now.

Also unlike American superheroes they don't constantly piss me off with idiot edge lord plots.

at this point the term memerap is used as a way of saying "Lol their music is only aboub bitches and money and so that kids like it like lil b" and then do the obvious ">XDLELE REDDIT ARMY"

calling madvilainy meme rap would be like calling the dark side of the moon memerock (music produced and/or promoted with the intention of going viral and becoming a meme.)
